ComicInfo.Title: The Firkin Version; Wonder Wart-Hog and the Merciless, Menacing, Masked Meanie!; What's the Use of Gettin' Sober?; Danger Vacation; The Baby Godzilla Story; The Penance; The Casebook of Doctor Feelgood; Elvis is Alive!; My Life in Art; Hats Across America; Warm in Winter; Fred & Frank are on Vacation; The Long Way Home; Heavy Stuff
ComicInfo.Summary: Mary's ex-boyfriend gives a ride to three people he doesn't even know.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 22:41:50. [CVDB176152] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 20:51:01. [Issue ID 358734]
